You're high up over the Grand Canyon. The air is crisp. The view is beautiful. You are elated beyond measure. A bald eagle attacks your hang glider and you're not wearing any goggles, helmet, or gloves.

You turned into a wolf and stayed in that shape for a whole year. In that year, you founded a pack, took a mate, produced a litter of pups. You transform back into a human right before a big fight with the neighboring pack alpha male. You are now naked in the forest and trying to hide from all those wolves on edge.

I wish to be inside of a video game.

You're the first level boss in an easy game. Enjoy having your ass handed to you time and time again.

You have your harem and all the girls love you. Unfortunately, you impregnate every single one of them within their first month with you, and now you're stuck with a horde of moody girls who want massages, prenatal vitamins, sonograms, baby showers ...

By the next morning, the termites that live in the mound have gnawed off your feet and legs and they are busy turning your head into wood pulp to feed their larva.

choices: The USA returns to the era of steam ...
111111111111111121111111111.content:
BUT that's impossible. So your wish has been granted by making you think children's programming is not stupid through reducing your common sense and IQ. This was actually an after-effect of a virus released by major corporations' lobbyists to get the public to think politicians and their actions are not stupid. The result is that the masses are easier to control and waste their money on frivolous items making huge profits for those who already have more money than they need. Plus kids grow up less intelligent because they watch children's TV. (It's a good thing adult TV is so much better )

Have fun replacing that.

Although you initially find the repetitive line of zeros monotonous, you soon begin to see faces, flowers, dancing balls, and a myriad of fanciful creatures and objects that you start to doodle them in, searching out colored pens and pencils to articulate your vision while ignoring all other sensations as you clamor to work quicker with expanding enthusiasm as the numeric circles drive every fiber of energy in your body to high excitement so that soon the speed of your hands and mind match the speed of light converting all your mass into pure energy, and just as you are about to reach the googolplex climax you body explodes leaving the essence of your mind to realize that you actually wasted your time on cutesy drawings, your life is an utter unless attempt at accomplishing the unattainable. Your estate is also sued after your demise by Google who has purchased all rights to anything similar to its name claiming you did not have its permission to doodle a googolplex.

111111111111111121121112.content:
There is a device that can be used to swap heads. It's called a 'guillotine'. Now, this 'guillotine' (hand gestures provided by Dr. Evil) is the most simple thing, you just lean the vic- subject number one's neck in the machine slot. Then, you set the safety device known as the 'lock' so that the procedure may continue in peace, as the subject may experience a sensation of fear and despair, but this will only happen if you either failed to administer enough ehem, 'assurance' so that they think that this is a completely safe procedure. Next, you pull the device known as the 'lever' that activates the mechanisms that make this procedure so easy. Now, by this point, you will have a perfectly swappable head and a recipient body. You will know that you followed the instructions correctly by the sudden silence that comes when the vi- patient stops screaming, otherwise you may need to repeat the steps a few times. Now that you have a head and a body, you just repeat those steps with the next subject until you have two heads and to recipient bodies. Unfortunately, this machine lacks the function to properly attach the heads to the bodies, a feature that we plan to add in later versions. But that can be fixed with a variety of tools, including: cateurization via a welding torch, sewing needles, industrial grade glue, and many other things. If you lack the money to buy our latest Guillotine model XVI then don't worry, we have a much more economic solution. It's called a 'blade', and comes in many different models and sizes! As a side note, results may vary, so may blade prices. Product use is subject to buyer's local law, and may be allowed or banned in accordance. Smiling Tools & Co. is not held responsible for damages caused by use or misuse of it's products.

Alternatively: There's a device that trades the minds of people. Drunken and misplaced terrorists who may or not be high use it to swap the minds of heads of state with the cast of Jersey Shore. In a matter of eight minutes the affected nations are a rampant anarchy with a populace consisting of overly tanned rioters and a huge increase in the demand for hair gel and tanning cream, which escalates into a global recession.

11111121111112111211122.content:
Only a prankster of a wish-granter would change anyone into a frog for jumping. Besides, frogs don't jump "high."

Your wish is fulfilled by becoming the greatest high-jumper in history. You go to the Olympics and win. You win at every track meet everywhere in the world. You spend every waking hour training so you can always jump high. This leaves you without a social life which is actually good because, after winning every time, everyone hates you now.

You become depressed and finally make your greatest high jump. As you do you think back to what it might have been like to be a frog. You then land awkwardly and break your neck leaving you paralyzed and in a coma for several years until you're given an experimental drug made from frog juice. You jump out of bed and start bounding down the hall, out the doors and into a nearby pond. You're attacked by all the frogs there and are pulled barely alive and taken back to the hospital where they have to strap you down to keep you from constantly jumping.

Fortunately, you are now conscious and able to speak. Well, maybe croak is the better word for the sounds that come from your mouth. After another year, a young intern tests you to type on a computer. Miraculously, you compose words that make sense and everyone is amazed. Unfortunately, your mind is still mush, and all you want to type are poems about water lilies and fantasies about being turned into a frog. They are not good enough to publish and make money to pay your bills, so they take the computer away.

This sends you into the deepest of depression, and finally you even stop croaking at the moon. One night a shooting star sails across the sky outside your window. You make one wish upon a star thinking your dreams will come true. When you fall asleep and dream, it is no longer of frogs. You see a stary sky with flashes sailing across it. You smile involuntarily as the sound of another shooting star thunders down upon the hospital. Your body is fried with nothing remaining but your legs which propelled you to jump so high. When those are pulled from the wreckage, their aroma makes the workers eyes water. Your legs were delicious.

Your wish to be your baby falcon's mom has been granted.

Your excellent vision from hundreds of feet up can spot the smallest of creatures - yummy morsels for you and your baby. A sudden swoop, and your claws can nab any critter that you will peck apart and swallow pieces to partially digest before returning to your nest to regurgitate some for your baby.

Maternal instinct takes over, and you circle high before starting your dive. Reaching speeds of over two hundred miles per hour (320 km/hr), you will teach that human to take your baby.

info.brief_description: Be careful what you wish for! A simple but fun and creative game! :)
info.description:
2018 Quill Award winner, which is...actually a heck of a wonderful surprise! So so happy that people enjoy this so much! Here's to many more years of the same!

The idea behind Corrupt-A-Wish is that someone posts any wish they can think of and another person finds a creative way of corrupting it, as well as posting a wish of their own. e.g.
Poster #1 - I wish I had an apple
Poster #2 - Granted, but it's rotten. I wish...

Of course, you can go a lot crazier than that! :)

Rules;
1) No swearing - light swearing is okay but no f-words, b-words etc
2) I'll allow sexual innuendoes! :P
3) Keep the wishes short if you can, but I'm not too fussed about it really... the corrupts can be as long as you want!
4) Try to add your own title to each new entry

That's about it for now - have fun! :)

PS: Over 400 chapters? Brilliant - thank you guys so much :D
